import React from 'react' import Slider from "react-slick"; import Data from './Data' const productItems=Data.productItems const SlideCard = () => { var settings = { //dots: true, infinite: true, slidesToShow: 4, slidesToScroll: 1, //autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 2000, pauseOnHover: true, nextArrow:, prevArrow:, } return ( <>
{ productItems.map((path,index)=>{ return(
{path.discount}% OFF Sold Out

{path.name}

{path.price}$

)}) }
) } export default SlideCard
